tool_description: Live COVID-19 vaccine availability information loaded in real-time from https://www.vaccines.gov
name: Vaccines Availability Data - USA
title: Vaccines Availability Data - USA

api_list.name: List Medications
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://vaccines-availability-data-usa.p.rapidapi.com/api/medications"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vaccines-availability-data-usa.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://vaccines-availability-data-usa.p.rapidapi.com/api/medications"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vaccines-availability-data-usa.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Fetch Vaccine Provider Details
api_list.description: Provides detailed information for a particular vaccine provider

required_parameters.name: providerId
required_parameters.description: Provider Id of a Vaccine Provider

api_list.name: Search Vaccine Providers - By Zipcode
api_list.description: Provides a list of vaccine providers in the vicinity of a  zipcode

required_parameters.name: radius
required_parameters.description:
Radius (In Miles) - Must be among the following values
-  radius=1
-  radius=5
-  radius=10
-  radius=25
-  radius=50
-  radius=100

api_list.name: Search Vaccine Providers - By Location
api_list.description: Provides a list of vaccine providers in the vicinity of a  Location (Latitude & Longitude)

required_parameters.name: radius
required_parameters.description:
Radius (In Miles) - Must be among the following values
-  radius=1
-  radius=5
-  radius=10
-  radius=25
-  radius=50
-  radius=100
